product.title: Skate Like A Girl Mini Pennant • Oxford Pennant Original
product.description: Partnering with Skate Like a Girl, Oxford Pennant created these original designs to support their mission of creating an inclusive community by promoting confidence, leadership, and social justice through skateboarding. 50% of all sales of these items go directly to advancing that goal. This design is also available as a pennant or camp flag. Size: 4" x 9" Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt, screen-printed design
product.descriptionHtml:
Partnering with Skate Like a Girl, Oxford Pennant created these original designs to support their mission of creating an inclusive community by promoting confidence, leadership, and social justice through skateboarding. 50% of all sales of these items go directly to advancing that goal. 

This design is also available as a pennant or camp flag. 

Size: 4" x 9"

Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt, screen-printed design
